column4: Hi everyone. This isnt exactly the place i need to be, but im hoping someone here could point me in the right direction
I use a browser called dillo and am having a problem with it, if anyone knows it and can help me, toss me a pm, please
its my first time coming in here so i wasnt sure of the exact rules. since it wasnt exacly a ubuntu question i didnt want to be accused of being off topic :P
without knowing your exact issue it will be hard to redirect. give it a shot and I promise if you are offtopic I will chastise you :P
